website_summaries.verdict: Logitech's G15 Gaming Keyboard is an ambitious attempt at the ultimate frag aid. The LCD screen is an inventive addition, but other features such as customizable keys, blue LED backlighting, and built-in USB ports have more practical applications. If you're serious about gaming and like to tinker with mini apps, the G15 is the keyboard for you.
pros: Tons of keys and customization options
LCD screen can display in-game data and other info
backlit keys for typing in the dark
toggle lets you disable the Windows key
cons: limited number of apps for the LCD screen, fewer still the average user will find useful

customer_reviews.title: Not the product that I expected
customer_reviews.text: I've owned two of these keyboards and neither one of them lasted long. The quality isn't that great and it is an extremely large keyboard. It also requires a good amount of space to accommodate it. The LCD is quite outdated now and not as user friendly as newer models, but for it's time, it was functional and served it's purpose. The keys are and always have been good to the touch, but are annoyingly loud, especially during high speed typing. Personally speaking, for it's time, it was a great product until it got a little age under it. After that, you had to deal with the compromise in performance and rickety construction.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn C

customer_reviews.title: the M1,M2 and M3 buttons get gummed up easy and can stick. but you can just use the software to get around them
customer_reviews.text: These are getting hard to find now. I'm on my second one now. the first one arrived with led light problems, but worked great for about 8 years. I had to have another one. so I got two more. The fully programmable keys is great for anything you can think of. You can add time delay on press stroke and up stroke. or any where you want in macro. The second keyboard has no problems yet, and all the software is still supported. I just hope the software is supported when I have to dig the 3rd one out.
customer_reviews.author: John States

customer_reviews.title: Decent gaming keyboard with a large footprint
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard lasted me a solid 4 years before being replaced. The LCD is a bit gimmicky, but came in handy for notifications without having to alt-tab, such as music. Some of the keys started to crap out, which is bound to happen with non-mechanical keyboards after repeated use. Replaced it with a CM Storm and haven't looked back. I do miss the media keys and macros, but for general purpose they are extraneous.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ability to key and macro customization
customer_reviews.text: I got this keyboard during my MMO RPG times. I used to play FFXI and adored the fact I could Macro 18 Keys x 3. Basically you have 18 keys that you can assign your own values, each key as 3 profiles, meaning you can easily switch between profiles to use a different function of the key. The LCD screen was cute at the time, but meh... Never found it that helpful. Overall it was a great keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: myMarcio

customer_reviews.title: G-15 Looks Great, Almost Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: The backlighting and display on this keyboard are really cool. I was hoping the programmable keys would save me a lot of steps, but with three layers on 18 keys, I can't remember where I programmed anything. It's not nearly as useful as my X-keys where the function is printed right on the key. The G15 offers an easy way to print out the mapping, but then you have to refer to a chart all the time. It sure looks great on my desk, though, and I really like the volume control and keys for controlling iTunes.
customer_reviews.author: X-keys

customer_reviews.title: Good Gaming keyboard
customer_reviews.text: If you're a gamer, this is a nice one to have. You can create simple macros in game, or u can create them out of game with the number of milliseconds in between each key press. The only thing I can gripe a little about is a "soft" set of keys that require a lot of "travel" to press down, and the little "feet" in the back bottom of the keybord aren't long enough. If you've got bit fat fingers, this keyboard will do just fine, otherwise it takes a little getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Eli M

customer_reviews.title: Nice Keyboard but....
customer_reviews.text: I don't find the extra Gkeys as use full as I thought they would be. Great board for a hardcore gamer. My left shift key (the one I use) doesn't always work. The media functions are great.... if you use them. The keys are kinda and I mean kinda hard to see in daylight. The tab things on the underside don't raise the board as much as I would like and it feels like a laptop board sometimes (But good for gaming). Overall close to the perfect keyboard. I've used the board for about 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W. Wines

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this keyboard since Logitech rolled it out, I think 2006. It has served me well for the 8 or so years since. About a month ago the backlight and LCD display started flickering and cycling through the applets like crazy. I tried everything I could think of including taking the whole thing apart. Visually all the components were fine, so I bought the same model used and so far it is working just as well as the last. I love having the media control keys easily accessible and performance monitor on the LCD, I can tell if silent programs are leeching CPU or RAM. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: N. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard I've owned in 15+ years
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is just great - plain and simple! I go through many keyboards at work (in IT) and this is the first I found worth giving up my first (1999) wireless Logitech keyboard (that still works like new to this day). An impulse buy thanks to the package deal with the G7 mouse and discount from Amazon - I'm happy to have bought it. Macro keys are great for any use not just gaming, and the backlit blue keys are great for surfing, gaming or writing mails in the dark at night. It is a bit awkward to use at first due to the macro keys section and the hand positioning, but after a while it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: W. E. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Nice keyboard but dark keys a dealbreaker
customer_reviews.text: Brought mine when it just came out so maybe they've tweaked it by now but the light letters on dark keys just dont work well during the day. They're light blue against black and the contrast just wasnt good enough. At night or in a dark room visibility is a lot better. The room where I keep my PC has a lot of natural light during the days, so I've since switched to the Saitek Eclipse keyboard (blue against silver keys) which I can comfortably use night and day. The Saitek doesnt have all the features of the logitech, so if Logitech comes out with a G15 with silver keys I would probably switch back.
customer_reviews.author: Paul O

customer_reviews.title: Logitech G15 Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The logitech G15 keyboard is by far the best keyboard on the market. From its backlit keys to its digital display this is a solid package. It has 2 USB ports on the back side of the keyboard, mini multimedia control area. It gives you fedback on time/date, CPU/RAm usage, and if you rlistening to music it will display the track name, band, and length of the song for you! The G15 has 18 programmable macro buttons for the hardcore gamer! The $79.95 is totally worth it! Combine this with the Logitech MX518 GG mouse and you've got the complete desktop!
customer_reviews.author: T. Haskell

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect keyboard. Not too big
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect keyboard. Not too big, not too small. Tenkeys, yes. Mute button, volume dial, windows key switch. Just perfect. So glad I could find another one when my old one died. (It lived a long and happy life, but i was sad to see it go.)
customer_reviews.author: Amber W

customer_reviews.title: VERY cool toy for the geek dad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who is a little geeky. He absolutely loves it. He was pleasantly surprised at the tracking of the LED screen. While in-game it scrolls through team & individual stats & other vital information. He said it's like having a much smaller monitor that constantly tracks & displays important information. Of course, don't forget the easy to program macro keys.
customer_reviews.author: MFamTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great in Windowds, not a lot of support for Linux
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard in general! It's a very good keyboard that's very easy to use. Awesome for gaming and listening to music! I haven't used the macros and stuff too much, and there is only one profile that came with it, but you are supposed to be able to do some basic programming and write new profiles that are incredibly useful in games like Unreal. Unfortunately, as is the case with a LOT of things, this product has very slim support and compatibility with Linux except for the keyboard itself and music applications, like Amarok. Luckily, Linux isn't a big gaming OS anyway. haha.
customer_reviews.author: Joel A. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest keyboard I have ever seen. The backlighting is superb for use in dim to no lighting. The keys have a nice crisp feel to them. The macro keys are extremely useful in games as well as about every other program I can think of. Just make sure you have plenty of room on your keyboard tray (if you use one) cause this baby is big :)
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard! Bad Paint.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is great! Good key feel, the "G" keys are very handy for MMO/FPS/RTS games alike. I don't use the LCD much yet, but there are a ton of little applets out there that can display a ton of information. My only complaint about this keyboard is that the key labels are painted on, and after extended gaming use, the "WSAD" keys paint has rubbed off to varying degrees. The S is completely gone while the other 3 are just smudged. Otherwise, I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Haigh

customer_reviews.title: Nice Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard mainly because I game in the dark. Yes, all of the keys do light up in blue. No, the color does not appear to wear out. I have been pounding on it non-stop for about 3 months now and have had no wear related issues. Unfortunately the macro buttons don't always work like they should. I think it is a software related issue (hence only 4 stars). I don't care though, I just bought it because the keys light up.
customer_reviews.author: Droop

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with Logitech...
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is worth every penny. The macro keys give any gamer added value, the backlit blue keys look really cool and everything just feels like it should. The LED screen is a bit basic but I doubt anybody who games regularly is going to be looking at it (I mostly just use it for the media player aspect of displaying the artist and song when I use iTunes on shuffle during games.) In addition, it's a Logitech product so you know it will last a good long time. If you've been toying around with the idea of buying a more gamer-centric keyboard, get the G15. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Deston

customer_reviews.title: Good Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This replaced the Saitek Eclipse after that stopped working after a year. So far, I'm very happy with this keyboard. I don't use the software, but even so it recognizes WoW and automatically loads that configuration. Good, solid, and reliable. And the blue light is nice. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DTG

customer_reviews.title: Logitech .. I Love you......q
customer_reviews.text: When I unwrapped this board I held it aloft over my head and heard a choir of angels singing and golden rays of light burst from the heavens and shined upon me.....yah..its that good! Wow...where do I begin?!? This board has it all for the gamer in mind! Super nice keystrokes, Multi-media buttons, Light up keys, LCD system monitoring display, Programable on the fly macros, 2*USB ports, and just looks totally sweet! This board does take up some real estate on the desktop, and will is a little heavy if you do a lot of LANing, but its well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sauce!
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm...what else can I say? Everyone has already pointed out all the great positives this keyboard has. So let me point out the one PITA...getting used to the key layout. Since the board has teh programmable function keys on the left side, I find myself slightly 'shifted' and hitting the wrong keys when typing. I'm sure this will go away with time as I get used to the layout. GREAT KEYBOARD! BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Hoody

customer_reviews.title: Durable and long-lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I've been dragging this beast around the country with me for years. It's starting to see some wear and tear but everything still works perfectly. I love this keyboard and when mine finally breaks, I'll certainly buy another of this type.
customer_reviews.author: eric schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. My only gripe with it was that I expected an American standard keyboard lay out and got a European. Many of the keys weren't even in English. Be warned before you buy this product. Make sure that you are getting what you paid for. My solution was to simply replace the keys with keys from my old keyboard which was a G-11.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered my 3rd G15 keyboard. The first one was a gift for one of my children, the second for myself and the third is another gift. Even though it is a gaming keyboard, the macro capabilities for repetitive keystrokes make this keyboard usable for any and all. A plus is the lighted keys. You won't need the lights on at night to find the keys.
customer_reviews.author: D. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Failed to mention French format.
customer_reviews.text: The seller failed to mention this is a french formatted keyboard. Otherwise I would rate five stars. I swapped as many keys from my old one to this one as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Callak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has been solid and reliable... no issues for many years!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gaming Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is amazing, taking gaming to a whole new dimension. The flip-up LCD offers not just your gaming specs, but monitors your CPU and RAM usage, displays media from Windows Media Player, and a clock with date and time. It has two USBs attached, and you can even change the brightness of the keyboard, and the volume. The macros are great, even if you are not using them for games (shortcuts, hotkeys. The keyboard is on the big side, and I wish that it had been cordless (but it's impossible), but overall, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Gamer Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Been using this model for years, and years. Finally I had to replace, I wore the other one out. Like the lighted keyboard, number pad, and the ability to program hot keys.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mccluskey

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard has a great key touch and the light with three settings is very useful. I have used the programmable keys and the USB ports. I purchased another one for my 10 year old, and she is very happy with it. The only con I have is the slots under the keyboard to contain the cord are too small to bother with.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for any WoWer
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard! The backlit keys are great for playing in low-light conditions. The macro keys are great kicking off sequences of actions in games. The display is not always useful, but it looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: N. Bartscher

customer_reviews.title: works great, I still can't really figure out how to ...
customer_reviews.text: works great, I still can't really figure out how to get the G keys to work in their entirety but that is do to my own personal incompetents, do wish it had RGB lighting...
customer_reviews.author: Alpha

customer_reviews.title: Inexplicably quits working
customer_reviews.text: They say every program has bugs and this product is not an exception. This is a very good keyboard for everything except gaming. I play massive multiuser online games (MMO) and I cannot tell you how many times the keyboard just stops working. Usually at the most inopportune moment, suddenly none of the programable keys that I spent hours programming will work. But for anything else this keyboard is great, but if you are fighting that gnoll, or dragon in a MMO there is a good chance that the keyboard will not be there when you need it and you are cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Rickenbee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gaming Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more pleased with item! Gave this as a gift to my gaming boyfriend and he absolutley LOVED IT!! Its keystroke is very softdoesn't have that noisly click clacking sound most keyboards make! He programed his "hot keys" right away and was having such an incredible time on Guild Wars!! I'd recommend this to any good gamer who wants to stay ahead of the game!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Elio

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Item shipped fast and arrived in perfect conditions, it has been suitable to my needs and I have nothing negative in response.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Granados

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming keyboard on the market
customer_reviews.text: I love to play games in a dark room and the backlit keybord is the only way I can do this. The macro keys and programming are extremely easy to figure out. The only CON would be the USB connectors are not USB 2.0 compatable
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: G15 Gaming Board Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my 16 year old grandson because it was on his wish list for Christmas. This along with the Logitech G7 Laser Cordless Mouse just about completed the computer he built for himself. These gifts truly brought a smile to his face and made his eyes sparkle like I haven't seen since he was five years old.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Alt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard, doesn't handle pitchers of beer very well. Thanks college.
customer_reviews.author: Wilkerda

customer_reviews.title: key board
customer_reviews.text: I waited a long time to buy a gameing keyboard wish I had goten it sooner as this is the best keyboard i have ever had
customer_reviews.author: Walter N. Selby

customer_reviews.title: can't operate
customer_reviews.text: don't know how to use it. needs manual to show how to operate it by pitcures to. do you have such a manual.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Thomas J. Allen Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Keys wearing out
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my partner for Christmas and she has been using it steadily since then. She is taking college courses online and does alot of typing. The "E" is gone, it just shows the blue light coming through. Even the space bar is wearing out. I have been using Logitech keyboards for years and every one I have owned has had the print on the keys worn off from moderate to heavy use. The RMA process with Logitech is cumbersom at best, so my next keyboard will be something else, like maybe an Optimus keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: Logitech g15
customer_reviews.text: It really pretty nice but for one thing... The switch that turns off the windows keys should also turn of caps lock and the lights under those keys. After almost a year of use I am still pretty well pleased with this keyboard. It is the first one I've used for this long that still shows the key labels on e, a, s and d keys. Macro recording is easy and useful.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia Wire

customer_reviews.title: Logitech G15
customer_reviews.text: the keyboard is good quality. the backlight is week unless you are directly over the keys. In daylight the keys are hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: A. Middendorff

customer_reviews.title: Unmactched
customer_reviews.text: For any command-driven program, this keyboard is unmatched in performance and customization. Having three profiles of 18 keys is a very useful overabundance
customer_reviews.author: Julian Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard Letters a problem
customer_reviews.text: I've had this keyboard for about a month, and the letters on the keyboard are starting to blur. The "e" key is barely legible, and other keys are showing problems. I wrote to product support about this, so I'll see what they have to say about the problem. At the moment though, I have to not give it the 5 stars I was going to give it when I first got the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schlickbernd

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: It's everything gamers need and easy to use. Also good if you have trouble seeing like me. The keys are large and and the features are sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Goodson

customer_reviews.title: Really cool
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes his new keyboard. The blue lights help for night time playing. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G.

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Macros are great. Light up feature is great for when the lights are off with a sleeping baby. Husband loves it for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: New first time mom

customer_reviews.title: Logitech G15
customer_reviews.text: The G15 gaming keyboard that's shown in the picture above was not the one I received, which should have had blue key board lights and a fold down window. I was never told if this was a replacement or if they were out of stock. The one I received had orange key board lights and the window didn't fold down.
customer_reviews.author: HANK

customer_reviews.title: Highly Rated Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for our son and he loved it. He likes the backlit display and says that the feel of the keyboard is good. Overall he was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I have been really pleased with this gaming keyboard. The only problems I have are with the program keys do not always work correctly in some games. But this is still the best keyboard I have found so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I would recommend it to anyone who is an online first person shooter gamer. Great keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY BOVA

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard shown online had a lighted RED display. It's what all my previous lighted keyboards have had. Imagine my disappointment when I got this and set it up only to see a washed out blue color which was very difficult to read. It's going back!
customer_reviews.author: Toni K. Burniston

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it looks
customer_reviews.text: I bough it for the programmable key which work well. my problom starts when I try and type anything. No matter how hard or soft I push the keys they dont always work right an thats a problom to me.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Beat to hell, but it works.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this g15 keyboard it said it was in "good" used shape. When I got it there was no LCD screen it was broken off, some of the keys on the top row don't work either. The rest of the keys work and the backlight still does.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Item is different from what i ordered
customer_reviews.text: The G15 series 1 similar to this picture was what i ordered. Sad to say is what was delivered to me was the smaller G15 series 2. I don't know if i can still return this as the unit is now in the Philippines. The package was delivered to my sister in law's house in Las Vegas and she brought the wrong item here in the Philippines. I already have 2 units of the G15 series 2. Such a frustration on my part...
customer_reviews.author: Raymund D. Marave

customer_reviews.title: Great Item, Bad Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could have found this keyboard somewhere else for the price Amazon had it at the time, they now raised it ten bucks. After waiting a week for it to ship UPS ground took 7 days to get here, and to make things even worse it looks like Amazon sent me the most damaged box in the warehouse. Oh well my keybaord is sick I just have to figure out how to use the Media controls in wmp.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Fisher

product_meta.title: Logitech G15 Gaming Keyboard
product_meta.description:
G15 Gaming Keyboard USB Game Panel DISP

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Logitech® G15 Keyboard™ offers gamers an unprecedented level of in-game information, programmability, and control. Its adjustable-tilt, backlit LCD display shows you crucial system info during game play, and lets you set timers to keep track of game events. You can even stay in touch with your IM buddies while you're playing! The 18 programmable G Keys™ let you execute macros—for example, casting spells in World of Warcraft with a single button press—and the backlit keys are great for lights-out play. The Logitech® G15 Keyboard™ also has a switch that turns off the Windows® key so hitting it won't accidentally end your game. It´s completely customized to help you play better. Try it and you won't imagine going back to a standard keyboard.

 Features

 

 * View game stats. Use the GamePanel™ LCD to view game stats, create new macros, and keep track of important system information without leaving the game. LCD panel closes completely for storage. 
 * Play in the dark. Illuminated characters are easily visible in both bright and low-light conditions. Three levels of backlighting brightness for late-night gaming sessions. 
 * Create and save new macros with a press of a button—while you´re still playing. 18 fully programmable "G Keys" have three shift states for 54 possible custom macros per game 
 * Eliminate cable hassles! Intelligently route mouse, headset, or other cables using convenient channels under the keyboard. 
 * Begin playing immediately. Basic media controls -- Play/pause, track forward/back, stop, mute, and volume up/down—are all easy to find. 
 * Record custom key sequences. Make on-the-fly additions to your key programming set with Macro Record button. 
 * Watch and listen. Convenient media keys for easy management of video and audio playback. 
 * Play forever. Super robust keys are rated to 20 million key presses — twice the durability of normal keyboard keys. Gaming Mode Switch disables the Windows key so you don´t get dropped out of your game if you accidentally touch it. Detachable palmrest provides ergonomic comfort for long sessions.

Adjustable-tilt, backlit LCD display
The GamePanel™ LCD shows you crucial system information during gameplay. Folding LCD panel
Closes completely for storage or transportation.

 Backlit keys
Three brightness levels, for playing in darkened rooms.

 Programmable G keys
Perform single keystrokes or complex macros with 18 programmable G keys.

 

 System Requirements

 

 * PC with Pentium® processor or compatible 
 * Windows® XP 
 * 256 MB RAM 
 * 20 MB of available hard disk space 
 * CD-ROM drive 
 * USB port 
 * GamePanel™ LCD requires software that supports Logitech® GamePanel™ technology.

Package Contents 

 * Logitech® G15 Gaming Keyboard 
 * Installation CD with GamePanel™ software 
 * User Guide 
 * One-year limited warranty
feature_bullets: High level of information, programmability and control

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars227 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
